forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 59. West southwest wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 74, with temperatures falling to around 72 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
Tonight in Downtown San Francisco, the air is calm and mostly clear, inviting those who find solace in the coolness of the evening to venture outside. With a gentle west-southwest breeze blowing, the low temperature around 59 offers a refreshing breeze that wraps around you, perfect for a light cardigan or a cozy scarf. As dawn breaks on Sunday, the sun will rise to cast its golden rays on the city, promising a delightful day ahead. The weather will be predominantly sunny, with temperatures reaching a pleasant high of about 74. The winds may stir up a vibrant dance, reaching speeds of up to 17 mph, occasionally gusting even higher. 

For today, the sky seems to hold no traces of the fog that often graces our shores. Instead, it appears to invite us into the clear embrace of a transition from summer’s warmth into autumn’s gentle touch. It's the perfect day to wander through the city’s vibrant neighborhoods, perhaps indulging in a leisurely brunch at a local café, where the enticing aroma of freshly brewed coffee fills the air. Or, for the more adventurous at heart, a stroll along the Embarcadero or a visit to a nearby park to catch a whiff of the bay breeze would rejuvenate the spirit. As the sun climbs, don lightweight attire, but keep a light layer handy for when the evening draws near.
